home.title: QuickUtil.app - Free PDF and Image Tools
home.description: PDF compression, image editing, and format conversion tools. Completely free, secure, and fast.
home.keywords: PDF compression, image editing, format conversion, free tools

pdfCompress.title: PDF Compression - Free PDF Size Reducer Tool
pdfCompress.description: Compress PDF files up to 90%. Completely free, secure, and fast PDF compression tool.
pdfCompress.keywords: PDF compression, reduce PDF size, compress PDF online

pdfConvert.title: PDF Conversion - Convert PDF to Image and Text
pdfConvert.description: Convert PDF to JPG, PNG, or extract text. Free PDF conversion tool.
pdfConvert.keywords: PDF conversion, PDF to JPG, PDF to PNG, PDF to text

imageCompress.title: Image Compression - Free Image Size Reducer
imageCompress.description: Compress JPEG, PNG, WebP images without losing quality. Free image compression tool.
imageCompress.keywords: image compression, JPEG compression, PNG compression

imageResize.title: Image Resize - Change Image Dimensions
imageResize.description: Resize images to desired dimensions. Pixel or percentage-based image resizing.
imageResize.keywords: image resize, change image size, resize images online
